text.intro: The diagram shows links between users leaving negative comments (Yellow nodes) on Monitored accounts (Red nodes). The presence of cones shaoed networks is a indication of some users targeting specific individuals and the more yellow nodes linked to a red node, the more users leaving negative or violent comments on that account.
text.title: Reply Network Showing Social Media Users against leaving OVAW-P comments and replies on Monitored Accounts

legend.nodeLabel: Users Vs gender of victims of OVAW-P
